title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be fortunate enough to be a pioneer in your field or to reach a milestone that no one in your inner circle has accomplished. However, standing out from the crowd may not feel as good as you or others imagined. Perhaps you dont receive the affirmation and validation you expected today. You can choose to see yourself as set apart either as a hermit or an exile. The real question is do you want to be a leader or a follower. Assume that you can blaze a trail for others to eventually join you rather than believe youre operating all alone. Being a maverick is a lonely but admirable job. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
